actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-836.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management

official_title: A bill to amend Section 46 of the Internal Revenue Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify for the full amount of the investment tax credit certain vessels (and a barge or container which is part of the complement of such vessel) financed by capital construction funds as established under the Merchant Marine Act of 1970. (Present law requires a reduction in the investment tax credit for vessels financed by capital construction funds.)

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 46 of the Internal Revenue Code.
